metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44716 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
net/http in Go before 1.16.12 and 1.17.x before 1.17.5 allows uncontrolled memory consumption in the header canonicalization cache via HTTP/2 requests.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44716` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-golang-x-net-dev - 1:0.0+git20211209.491a49a+dfsg-1
No subscription required
